BiomeEntity.Name: Plains
BiomeEntity.Description: A relatively flat and grassy biome with rolling hills and few trees.

BiomeEntity.Name: Snow Plains
BiomeEntity.Description: A barren and relatively inhospitable biome consisting mostly of snow-covered plains.

BiomeEntity.Name: Desert Plains
BiomeEntity.Description: A barren and relatively inhospitable biome consisting mostly of sand dunes, dead bushes, and cacti.

BiomeEntity.Name: Highland
BiomeEntity.Description: A hilly biome with a few scattered trees.

BiomeEntity.Name: Snow Highland
BiomeEntity.Description: A hilly and snowy biome with a few scattered evergreen trees.

BiomeEntity.Name: Desert Highland
BiomeEntity.Description: A hilly and arid biome with a few scattered trees and cacti.

BiomeEntity.Name: Swamp
BiomeEntity.Description: A mix of flat, dry areas around sea level and shallow pools of brackish green water with floating lily pads.

BiomeEntity.Name: Semiarid
BiomeEntity.Description: A relatively flat and dry biome with a dry grass ColourHexadecimal and scattered trees.

BiomeEntity.Name: Jungle
BiomeEntity.Description: A very dense, but rather uncommon tropical biome. It features large jungle trees.

BiomeEntity.Name: Forest
BiomeEntity.Description: A biome with a lot of trees, occasional hills, and a fair amount of vegetation.

BiomeEntity.Name: Mountains
BiomeEntity.Description: A vast biome known for huge mountain ranges, forests and it's inhospitability.

BiomeEntity.Name: Snow Mountains
BiomeEntity.Description: A vast and cold biome known for huge mountain ranges covered in snow, forests and it's inhospitability.

BiomeEntity.Name: Desert Mountains
BiomeEntity.Description: A vast and hot biome known for huge rocky mountain ranges.
